---
title: "generate_bostonMA"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r setup}
library(devtools)
library(downscaling)
```


```{r}
save_dir <- normalizePath("../tmp/", winslash = '/', mustWork = T)

tg_datanames <- downscaling::target_datanames(
  product = "LtSIF",
  targetname = "bostonMA",
  column <- "SIF_757nm",
  targetdate = c("220614"),
  resolution_m = c(330, 500),
  lambda = c(1, 5, 10, 15)
)
```

```{r clean_downscaled_files}
downscaling::cleaner(tg_datanames, save_dir = save_dir, 
                     delN = T, delG = T, 
                     delPG = F, del2D = F, 
                     dryrun = T)

```


```{r generate_downscaled_files}
for (idx in 1:nrow(tg_datanames) ) {
  downscaling::generator(tg_datanames[idx, ], save_dir = save_dir)
}
```
